title: New Flair?

comments.body: I'd highly suggest against this - we don't want this subreddit to become a jobs related feed. It'll lead to the spam of posts like the ones on WhatsApp
There will be moderation, even now I approve every post xD

On second thoughts, this subreddit is to discuss things related to PES; job posting is out of the scope of "PES Discussion"  
We will **not be going ahead** with this new flair on r/PESU
